home.getCodeOrCreateSim: If not, get one from your teacher/facilitator, or <1>create your own simulation.</1>

admin.deleteSimConfirmExplanation: Are you sure you want to delete the {{name}} simulation? This action cannot be undone.
admin.revokeSimConfirmExplanation: Are you sure you want your access to the {{name}} simulation revoked? This action cannot be undone.
admin.goBackSim: Backtrack this simulation by one page
admin.goBackAllSims: Backtrack all simulations by one page
admin.advanceSim: Advance this simulation by one page
admin.advanceAllSims: Advance all simulations by one page
admin.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset every simulation room? (A backup log will be saved.)
admin.confirmDeleteLog: Are you sure you want to delete this game log?

modal.inviteCollaboratorsExplanation: To add a collaborator, enter their email address. They will be sent a personal invitation link to create an account and join the simulation.

alert.inviteSuccessful: Invitations have been successfully sent to given email addresses.
alert.inviteError: An error has occured while attempting to send email invitations. Please try again.
alert.simNameRequired: A name is required for the simulation.
alert.simAlreadyExists: A simulation with this name already exists. Please pick a new name.
alert.imageTooLarge: Image must be 10MB or less. Please pick a smaller image.
alert.filledEmptyRoles_one: Nonexistant role {{roles}} has been replaced with an empty slot.
alert.filledEmptyRoles_other: Nonexistant roles {{roles}} have been replaced with empty slots.
alert.validCSVError: Please enter a valid CSV file.
alert.groupAlreadyExists: A group with this name already exists. Please pick a new name.
alert.emailSuccessful: Email invitations have been successfully sent to simulation participants.
alert.emailError: An error has occured while attempting to send email invitations. Please try again.
